name: European Association for Viewers Interests
goal:
Mission
The mission of EAVI is to serve the public interest in the fields of media.

Objectives
Therefore the EAVI primary objective is to promote and enhance the interests of citizens and media users across Europe.

EAVI works on media literacy, full citizenship and education.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Education, Home Affairs, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Youth
euInitiatives: EAVI follows the audiovisual and media related dossiers. As an example the digital skills, AVMSD, media literacy, copyright, privacy, media freedom and so on.
